scripts.docker:start: docker-compose exec app npm run start
scripts.docker:start:dev: docker-compose exec app npm run start:dev
scripts.docker:db:create: docker-compose exec app npm run db:create
scripts.docker:db:migration:new: docker-compose exec app npm run migration:new
scripts.docker:db:migration:lts: docker-compose exec app npm run migration:lts
scripts.docker:db:migration:up: docker-compose exec app npm run migration:up
scripts.docker:db:migration:down: docker-compose exec app npm run migration:down
scripts.docker:db:seed:new: docker-compose exec app npm run seed:new
scripts.docker:db:seed:all: docker-compose exec app npm run seed:all
